leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 地球科学-遥感与地理空间生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→检测/分割→变化检测→评测
leaf_cluster.tool_form: GIS工具 + CV框架 + 数据集

queries: [WEB] remote sensing deep learning tools github

tools.name: DCIC22_SAR_ship_detection
tools.one_line_profile: 3rd place solution for DCIC 2022 SAR ship detection challenge
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning based solution for detecting ships in Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) imagery, developed for the 2022 Digital China Innovation Contest.

tools.name: DiResNet
tools.one_line_profile: Direction-aware Residual Network for Road Extraction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of DiResNet, a deep learning model designed for extracting road networks from very high-resolution remote sensing images by incorporating direction-aware residual modules.

tools.name: LANet
tools.one_line_profile: Local Attention Embedding for Semantic Segmentation of Remote Sensing Images
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of LANet, which utilizes local attention embedding to improve the semantic segmentation performance on remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: River-Network-Extraction-with-Deep-Learning
tools.one_line_profile: Automated river network extraction from satellite imagery
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning project employing U-Net architecture to automate the precise segmentation and extraction of river networks from satellite imagery.

tools.name: Waste-Dump-Site-Detection-using-UAV-Imagery
tools.one_line_profile: Object detection model for identifying waste dump sites
tools.detailed_description: An object detection model designed to identify and classify waste dump sites in urban areas using UAV (Unmanned Aerial Vehicle) imagery.

tools.name: seg2map
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive web map app for geospatial image segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for downloading satellite imagery and applying deep learning segmentation models, developed by the Doodleverse research group for coastal and geospatial analysis.

tools.name: deep_residual_unet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Residual U-Net for Road Extraction
tools.detailed_description: Keras implementation of a Deep Residual U-Net model specifically designed for the task of road extraction from aerial or satellite imagery.

tools.name: satsense
tools.one_line_profile: Library for land use/cover classification using satellite imagery
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to facilitate land use and land cover classification tasks using satellite imagery, providing tools for feature extraction and classification.

tools.name: eskg
tools.one_line_profile: Earth Science Knowledge Graph for data discovery
tools.detailed_description: An automatic approach and toolset for building Earth Science Knowledge Graphs to improve the discovery and linkage of Earth Science data.

tools.name: UNetMamba
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient UNet-Like Mamba for Semantic Segmentation of RS Images
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of UNetMamba, a model integrating Mamba architecture into a U-Net structure for efficient semantic segmentation of high-resolution remote sensing images.

tools.name: Semantic-Segmentation-of-Remote-Sensing-Images
tools.one_line_profile: Remote sensing image segmentation using Deeplab V3+ and U-Net
tools.detailed_description: A collection of implementations for semantic segmentation of remote sensing images using Deeplab V3+ (with Xception and MobileNet V2 backbones) and U-Net models.

tools.name: SSAN
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral-Spatial Attention Network for Hyperspectral Image Classification
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Spectral-Spatial Attention Network (SSAN) designed for the classification of hyperspectral images.

tools.name: CCDC
tools.one_line_profile: Continuous Change Detection and Classification of land cover
tools.detailed_description: Algorithm for Continuous Change Detection and Classification (CCDC) of land cover using Landsat time-series data.

tools.name: WasteDetection
tools.one_line_profile: Waste Detection and Change Analysis on Multispectral Satellite Imagery
tools.detailed_description: Tools for detecting waste and analyzing changes based on multispectral satellite imagery, developed by GISLab at ELTE University.

tools.name: RoadLib
tools.one_line_profile: Library for visual road marking extraction and mapping
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight C++ library for instance-level visual road marking extraction, parameterization, and mapping from imagery.

tools.name: deepglobe_land_cover_classification
tools.one_line_profile: DeepGlobe Land Cover Classification with DeepLabV3+
tools.detailed_description: Implementation for the DeepGlobe Land Cover Classification Challenge using DeepLabV3+ for semantic segmentation of remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: wagl
tools.one_line_profile: Standardising satellite imagery into Analysis Ready Data (ARD)
tools.detailed_description: A Python library developed by Geoscience Australia for processing and standardising satellite imagery into Analysis Ready Data (ARD) form.

tools.name: earth-ml
tools.one_line_profile: Land cover classification using TensorFlow and Earth Engine
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools and examples for using TensorFlow models to perform land cover classification on Google Earth Engine datasets.

tools.name: SSLTransformerRS
tools.one_line_profile: Self-supervised Vision Transformers for Land-cover Segmentation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of self-supervised Vision Transformers for land-cover segmentation and classification in remote sensing images.

tools.name: CBRNet
tools.one_line_profile: Coarse-to-fine Boundary Refinement Network for Building Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning network designed for extracting building footprints from remote sensing imagery with a focus on boundary refinement.

tools.name: PolyR-CNN
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-End Polygonal Building Outline Extraction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of PolyR-CNN, a method for end-to-end extraction of polygonal building outlines from remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: UANet
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty-Aware Network for Building Extraction
tools.detailed_description: An uncertainty-aware network (UANet) designed to improve building extraction from remote sensing images by modeling uncertainty.

tools.name: SRSDD-V1.0
tools.one_line_profile: High-Resolution SAR Rotation Ship Detection Dataset
tools.detailed_description: A dataset specifically designed for high-resolution SAR ship detection with rotated bounding boxes.

tools.name: BEmodule-Satellite-Building-Segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Boundary Enhancement Semantic Segmentation for Building Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A module and approach for enhancing boundaries in semantic segmentation tasks, specifically applied to building extraction from remote sensed images.

tools.name: RetinaNet-PyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: RetinaNet implementation for remote sensing images
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the RetinaNet object detection architecture, adapted and tested for remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: ZoRI
tools.one_line_profile: Zero-Shot Remote Sensing Instance Segmentation
tools.detailed_description: Official PyTorch implementation of ZoRI, a method for discriminative zero-shot instance segmentation in remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: mug
tools.one_line_profile: Model to predict urban settlements in satellite images
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based deep learning model developed by IBM to predict urban settlements in satellite images using demographic and geospatial data.

tools.name: MVA2023SmallObjectDetection4SpottingBirds
tools.one_line_profile: Baseline for Small Object Detection Challenge for Spotting Birds
tools.detailed_description: Baseline code and tools for the MVA2023 Small Object Detection Challenge, focusing on spotting birds in imagery.

tools.name: rsdtlib
tools.one_line_profile: Remote Sensing with Deep-Temporal Data Library
tools.detailed_description: A library for handling and processing remote sensing data with a focus on deep learning and temporal data analysis, developed by IT4Innovations.

tools.name: RS-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Cloud detection algorithm for satellite imagery
tools.detailed_description: RS-Net is an algorithm designed for the detection of clouds in satellite imagery, aiding in the preprocessing and quality control of remote sensing data.

tools.name: EESRGAN
tools.one_line_profile: Small-Object Detection in Remote Sensing with Edge-Enhanced GAN
tools.detailed_description: An end-to-end framework combining Edge-Enhanced GAN and object detector networks for improving small-object detection in remote sensing images.

tools.name: ASD
tools.one_line_profile: Anomaly segmentation method for high-resolution remote sensing images
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of 'Anomaly Segmentation for High-Resolution Remote Sensing Images Based on Pixel Descriptors' (AAAI 2023). It provides a method to detect and segment anomalies in remote sensing imagery using pixel descriptors.

tools.name: FactSeg
tools.one_line_profile: Small object semantic segmentation for large-scale remote sensing imagery
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of FactSeg (TGRS 2021), a foreground activation-driven small object semantic segmentation framework designed specifically for large-scale remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: LoveDA
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset and benchmark for domain adaptive semantic segmentation in remote sensing
tools.detailed_description: A Remote Sensing Land-Cover Dataset for Domain Adaptive Semantic Segmentation (NeurIPS 2021). The repository serves as a benchmark platform and toolkit for evaluating domain adaptation methods in land-cover classification.

tools.name: Hyperspectral-DL
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning implementations for hyperspectral image land-cover classification
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive collection of deep learning models and methods for land-cover classification in hyperspectral images, serving as a reference library for researchers in hyperspectral analysis.

tools.name: UAV-Crack-Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset for crack detection and segmentation in UAV inspection
tools.detailed_description: A dataset and benchmark resource for crack detection and segmentation specifically designed for UAV-based infrastructure inspection tasks.

tools.name: YOLOv5-Satellite
tools.one_line_profile: YOLOv5 adaptation for satellite imagery object detection
tools.detailed_description: A specialized implementation and demonstration of YOLOv5 optimized for object detection tasks in satellite imagery, providing a baseline for remote sensing detection.

tools.name: RSMamba
tools.one_line_profile: Remote sensing image classification with State Space Models
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of RSMamba, applying State Space Models (Mamba) to remote sensing image classification tasks to capture long-range dependencies efficiently.

tools.name: RSPrompter
tools.one_line_profile: Prompt learning for remote sensing instance segmentation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of RSPrompter, a method leveraging visual foundation models and prompt learning for instance segmentation in remote sensing images.

tools.name: RSRefSeg
tools.one_line_profile: Referring remote sensing image segmentation with foundation models
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of RSRefSeg, a framework for referring image segmentation in remote sensing, utilizing foundation models to understand linguistic queries for segmentation.

tools.name: STT
tools.one_line_profile: Building extraction with Sparse Token Transformers
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of 'Building Extraction from Remote Sensing Images with Sparse Token Transformers', providing a specialized transformer-based model for building segmentation.

tools.name: MDGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Multiscale Dynamic Graph Convolutional Network for hyperspectral classification
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of MDGCN, a graph convolutional network approach for classifying hyperspectral images by capturing multiscale dynamic features.

tools.name: ARC
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive Rotated Convolution for rotated object detection
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of 'Adaptive Rotated Convolution for Rotated Object Detection' (ICCV 2023), providing a specialized convolution operator for detecting oriented objects in aerial images.

tools.name: RSCoTr
tools.one_line_profile: Co-training Transformer for remote sensing classification, segmentation and detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of RSCoTr (TGRS 2024), a unified transformer framework for multiple remote sensing tasks including classification, segmentation, and detection.

tools.name: DCFSL
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Cross-domain Few-shot Learning for hyperspectral classification
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Deep Cross-domain Few-shot Learning method for Hyperspectral Image Classification, addressing the challenge of limited labeled data in hyperspectral analysis.

tools.name: RSKT-Seg
tools.one_line_profile: Open vocabulary semantic segmentation in remote sensing
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a framework for Open Vocabulary Semantic Segmentation in Remote Sensing, enabling segmentation of categories not seen during training.

tools.name: RoadCorrector
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-aware road extraction and topology correction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for road extraction that specifically addresses road connectivity and topology correction using a structure-aware method.

tools.name: SHAFTS
tools.one_line_profile: Simultaneous extraction of building height and footprint
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning method for the simultaneous extraction of building footprints and estimation of building heights from remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: RMSIN
tools.one_line_profile: Rotated Multi-Scale Interaction Network for referring RS segmentation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of RMSIN, a network designed for referring remote sensing image segmentation that handles rotated objects and multi-scale interactions.

tools.name: DBFNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Bilateral Filtering Network for point-supervised segmentation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of DBFNet (TIP 2022), a deep bilateral filtering network designed for semantic segmentation in remote sensing images using only point supervision.

tools.name: DCA
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Covariance Alignment for domain adaptive RS segmentation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Deep Covariance Alignment (TGRS 2022), a domain adaptation method for remote sensing image segmentation.

tools.name: EMRDM
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion model for cloud removal in remote sensing images
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of EMRDM (CVPR 2025), a diffusion model-based approach for removing clouds from remote sensing imagery to restore ground information.

tools.name: Polygonization-FFL
tools.one_line_profile: Fast polygonal building extraction from overhead images
tools.detailed_description: A tool for fast and accurate polygonal building extraction from overhead/satellite images using Frame Field Learning.

tools.name: SARfish
tools.one_line_profile: Ship detection in Sentinel-1 SAR imagery
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool for detecting ships in Sentinel-1 Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) imagery, designed for maritime monitoring.

tools.name: GeoSpatial-UNET-Vector-Map
tools.one_line_profile: Vector map generation from aerial imagery using UNet
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for generating vector maps from aerial imagery by leveraging a semantic segmentation model (UNet) to extract and separate individual buildings.

tools.name: MTLCC
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-temporal land cover classification framework
tools.detailed_description: Source code and evaluation framework for Multi-temporal land cover classification (IJGI 2018), providing tools for analyzing land cover changes over time.

tools.name: 3DCAE-hyperspectral-classification
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised spatial-spectral feature learning for hyperspectral classification
tools.detailed_description: A 3-Dimensional Convolutional Autoencoder (3D-CAE) implementation for unsupervised feature learning in hyperspectral image classification tasks.

tools.name: Group-Aware-Hierarchical-Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Hyperspectral image classification using Group-Aware Hierarchical Transformer
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Group-Aware Hierarchical Transformer (GAHT) for hyperspectral image classification, focusing on capturing spatial-spectral features.

tools.name: CCExpert
tools.one_line_profile: Remote sensing change captioning with MLLM
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation for remote sensing change captioning using Difference-Aware Integration and a Foundational Dataset, advancing MLLM capabilities in this domain.

tools.name: RSBuilding
tools.one_line_profile: General remote sensing building extraction and change detection
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model-based approach for general building extraction and change detection in remote sensing images.

tools.name: SSPNet
tools.one_line_profile: Scale Selection Pyramid Network for tiny person detection in UAV images
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning network designed for detecting tiny persons in UAV (Unmanned Aerial Vehicle) imagery using a Scale Selection Pyramid.

tools.name: DroneObjectDetection
tools.one_line_profile: UAV object detection system based on YOLOv3
tools.detailed_description: A system for object detection in UAV imagery providing an interactive interface and training scheme for VisDrone2018.

tools.name: road-extraction-d-linknet
tools.one_line_profile: D-LinkNet implementation for road extraction
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow implementation of the D-LinkNet architecture specifically designed for road extraction tasks in remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: EfficientBigEarthNet
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient training tools for BigEarthNet LULC classification
tools.detailed_description: Code and models designed for efficient training on the BigEarthNet dataset for Land Use Land Cover (LULC) classification tasks.

tools.name: S2Mamba
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial-spectral State Space Model for Hyperspectral Classification
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of S2Mamba, a spatial-spectral state space model designed for hyperspectral image classification.

tools.name: UAVVaste
tools.one_line_profile: Waste detection in aerial images with COCO-like dataset
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit and dataset for waste detection in aerial images, providing a COCO-like dataset format and detection models.

tools.name: PaddleRS
tools.one_line_profile: Remote Sensing Toolkit based on PaddlePaddle
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive remote sensing toolkit based on PaddlePaddle, supporting tasks like image segmentation, object detection, and change detection in satellite imagery.

tools.name: PGL
tools.one_line_profile: Paddle Graph Learning framework
tools.detailed_description: An efficient and flexible graph learning framework based on PaddlePaddle, supporting graph neural networks often used in scientific modeling (e.g., molecular graphs).

tools.name: PLSC
tools.one_line_profile: Paddle Large Scale Classification Tools
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for large-scale image classification supporting various backbones (ResNet, ViT, etc.) and parallel training, applicable to scientific image analysis.

tools.name: PaddleMIX
tools.one_line_profile: Paddle Multimodal Integration and eXploration
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for multimodal deep learning, supporting large-scale pretrain models and diffusion models, applicable to multimodal scientific data analysis.

tools.name: PaddleRS
tools.one_line_profile: Awesome Remote Sensing Toolkit based on PaddlePaddle
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive remote sensing toolkit based on PaddlePaddle, supporting tasks like image segmentation, object detection, and change detection in satellite imagery.

tools.name: PaddleRobotics
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source algorithm library for robots
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm library for robotics based on Paddle, covering perception, SLAM, and navigation, which are key scientific engineering tasks.

tools.name: Minerva
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network fitting and testing for land cover data
tools.detailed_description: A package for fitting and testing neural network models on land cover data, designed to work with torchgeo datasets.

tools.name: SpA-GAN_for_cloud_removal
tools.one_line_profile: Cloud Removal for Remote Sensing Imagery using GAN
tools.detailed_description: A Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) based approach for removing clouds from high-resolution remote sensing imagery to recover ground information.

tools.name: SAR_Ship_detection_CFAR
tools.one_line_profile: Improved CFAR algorithm implementation for SAR ship detection
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of an improved two-parameter CFAR algorithm based on Rayleigh distribution and Mathematical Morphology specifically designed for ship detection in Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) imagery.

tools.name: YOLOv7_obb
tools.one_line_profile: Oriented object detection toolkit based on YOLOv7
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of YOLOv7 adapted for oriented bounding box (OBB) detection, specifically useful for aerial and satellite imagery where objects are arbitrarily oriented.

tools.name: SUNet
tools.one_line_profile: Change detection network for heterogeneous remote sensing images
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of SUNet (Siamese U-Net), a deep learning model designed for change detection in heterogeneous remote sensing images from satellites and UAVs.

tools.name: yolov3-vehicle-detection-paddle
tools.one_line_profile: Vehicle detection and type recognition using PaddlePaddle
tools.detailed_description: A vehicle detection and classification toolkit based on YOLOv3 implemented in the PaddlePaddle framework, suitable for traffic analysis in remote sensing or surveillance data.

tools.name: PaRK-Detect
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-task satellite imagery road extraction via keypoints
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning approach for efficient road extraction from satellite imagery using patch-wise keypoints detection, aiming to improve connectivity and accuracy.

tools.name: FusAtNet
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal fusion network for Hyperspectral and LiDAR classification
tools.detailed_description: A dual-attention based deep learning network for fusing and classifying hyperspectral and LiDAR data, addressing the challenge of multimodal remote sensing data analysis.

tools.name: UCD-SCM
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised change detection model for VHR images
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Segment Change Model (SCM) for unsupervised change detection in Very High Resolution (VHR) remote sensing images, specifically focusing on buildings.

tools.name: RegDA
tools.one_line_profile: Domain adaptation for remote sensing image segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for cross-domain remote sensing image segmentation that leverages local region homogenizing and the Segment Anything Model (SAM) to improve generalization.

tools.name: Remote-sensing-image-semantic-segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of semantic segmentation models for remote sensing
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library implementing various U-Net based and other deep learning models (ResNet, DenseNet, etc.) specifically tuned for semantic segmentation of remote sensing imagery using Keras.

tools.name: Remote-sensing-image-semantic-segmentation-tf2
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow 2 implementation of remote sensing segmentation models
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow 2.x based repository providing implementations of state-of-the-art semantic segmentation networks (DeepLabV3+, PSPNet, PANet, etc.) for remote sensing image analysis.

tools.name: remote-sensing-image-caption
tools.one_line_profile: Remote sensing image classification and captioning toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based toolkit for generating natural language descriptions (captions) and classifications for remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: AerialFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-resolution Transformer for aerial image segmentation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of AerialFormer, a Transformer-based architecture designed to handle the multi-scale nature of objects in aerial imagery for semantic segmentation tasks.

tools.name: UAV-NDFT
tools.one_line_profile: Robust object detection from UAVs using nuisance disentanglement
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for robust object detection in UAV imagery, featuring a Nuisance Disentangled Feature Transform (NDFT) to handle challenging conditions.

tools.name: 3DCD
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for 3D change detection in remote sensing
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting changes in elevation (3D) and land cover using deep learning on remote sensing data.

tools.name: Remote-Sensing-RVSA
tools.one_line_profile: Vision Transformer foundation models for remote sensing
tools.detailed_description: A library providing Rotated Varied-Size Window Attention (RVSA) based Vision Transformers, serving as backbone models for various remote sensing tasks like detection and segmentation.

tools.name: SAMRS
tools.one_line_profile: Scaling-up remote sensing segmentation with Segment Anything Model
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit and methodology for generating large-scale remote sensing segmentation datasets by leveraging the Segment Anything Model (SAM) and existing object detection labels.

tools.name: Demo_spectral_spatial_hyperspectral_classification
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for spectral-spatial hyperspectral classification
tools.detailed_description: A collection of MATLAB implementations for various spectral-spatial classification methods for hyperspectral imagery, including EMAP, Gabor filtering, LORSAL, and MRF.

tools.name: CrossEarth
tools.one_line_profile: Geospatial vision foundation model for cross-domain semantic segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model designed for remote sensing semantic segmentation that enables cross-domain generalization across different geographical regions and sensor types.

tools.name: STAR-MMRotate
tools.one_line_profile: Oriented object detection solver for the STAR dataset using MMRotate
tools.detailed_description: A specialized configuration and solver within the MMRotate framework tailored for oriented object detection on the STAR remote sensing dataset.

tools.name: h2rbox-mmrotate
tools.one_line_profile: Solver for generating rotated bounding boxes from horizontal annotations
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the H2RBox method integrated with MMRotate, enabling the learning of rotated object detection from horizontal box annotations in aerial images.

tools.name: mllm-mmrotate
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal language model baseline for aerial object detection
tools.detailed_description: A baseline tool leveraging multimodal language models (MLLM) for detecting objects in aerial imagery, integrated with the MMRotate ecosystem.

tools.name: sam-mmrotate
tools.one_line_profile: Segment Anything Model (SAM) integration for rotated bounding box generation
tools.detailed_description: A tool that utilizes the Segment Anything Model (SAM) to generate rotated bounding boxes for remote sensing objects, serving as a comparison method for weakly supervised approaches.

tools.name: GeoSeg
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive library for remote sensing semantic segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox containing implementations of various Transformers (UNetFormer, etc.) and CNNs specifically optimized for semantic segmentation of satellite, aerial, and UAV imagery.

tools.name: LEVIR-Ship
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset for tiny ship detection in medium-resolution imagery
tools.detailed_description: A curated dataset specifically designed for the task of detecting tiny ships in medium-resolution remote sensing images, serving as a standard benchmark.

tools.name: RotateObjectDetection
tools.one_line_profile: YOLOv5-based solver for rotated object detection
tools.detailed_description: An adaptation of the YOLOv5 framework adjusted to support rotated bounding box predictions, suitable for aerial and satellite imagery object detection.

tools.name: UNet-Satellite-Image-Segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight UNet implementation for satellite image segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow-based implementation of a lightweight UNet framework tailored for semantic segmentation tasks in remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: RoadMarkingExtraction
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic road marking extraction from point clouds
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool for the automatic extraction of road markings from Mobile Laser Scanning (MLS) or Airborne Laser Scanning (ALS) point cloud data.

tools.name: Data-CSHSI
tools.one_line_profile: Datasets for Cross-Scene Hyperspectral Image Classification
tools.detailed_description: A collection of open-source datasets specifically curated for the task of Cross-Scene Hyperspectral Image Classification.

tools.name: ChangeStar
tools.one_line_profile: Single-temporal supervised object change detection solver
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for object change detection in remote sensing imagery, supporting single-temporal supervision.

tools.name: FarSeg
tools.one_line_profile: Foreground-aware relation network for geospatial object segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A segmentation solver designed to handle foreground-background imbalance in high spatial resolution remote sensing imagery using relation networks.

tools.name: FreeNet
tools.one_line_profile: Fast patch-free global learning framework for HSI classification
tools.detailed_description: An end-to-end deep learning framework for hyperspectral image (HSI) classification that avoids patch-based processing for better efficiency.

tools.name: RSVG-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Visual grounding solver for remote sensing data
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation for Visual Grounding on Remote Sensing data (RSVG), providing models and data handling for locating objects based on natural language queries.

tools.name: Landsat-Time-Series-Analysis
tools.one_line_profile: GUI tool for Landsat time-series land cover classification
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool with a GUI for performing multi-temporal land cover classification using Landsat time-series data.

tools.name: pyatsa
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for automated time-series analysis of satellite imagery
tools.detailed_description: A Python package implementing the Automated Time-Series Analysis (ATSA) method for masking clouds and processing satellite imagery time series.

tools.name: HypelCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning classification framework for hyperspectral and LiDAR sensor data
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework designed for the classification of remote sensing data, specifically fusing spectral and spatial features from hyperspectral and LiDAR sensors.

tools.name: SOD-YOLO
tools.one_line_profile: Small object detection model for UAV imagery based on YOLOv8
tools.detailed_description: A specialized object detection model building upon YOLOv8, optimized for detecting small objects in complex backgrounds typical of UAV (Unmanned Aerial Vehicle) imagery.

tools.name: road_visualizer
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for road extraction datasets and results
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based visualization utility modified from the Spacenet competition visualizer, designed to display road extraction data and results, compatible with DeepGlobe datasets.

tools.name: urban_seg
tools.one_line_profile: Semantic segmentation toolbox for remote sensing imagery
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive collection of deep learning models and tools for semantic segmentation tasks specifically applied to remote sensing and urban imagery.

tools.name: Road-Extraction
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-stage road extraction method for surface and centerline detection
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning based solver for extracting road surfaces and centerlines from satellite imagery using a multi-stage approach.

tools.name: CRESI
tools.one_line_profile: City-scale Road Extraction and Speed Inference
tools.detailed_description: A tool for extracting road networks from satellite imagery and estimating speed limits and travel times, enabling routing and graph analysis.

tools.name: SIMRDWN
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid satellite imagery object detection framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for rapid object detection in large-scale satellite imagery, combining YOLT with other models to handle diverse resolutions and object sizes.

tools.name: YOLT
tools.one_line_profile: You Only Look Twice: Rapid Multi-Scale Object Detection
tools.detailed_description: An extension of YOLO optimized for detecting small objects in large satellite images by evaluating imagery at multiple scales.

tools.name: YOLTv4
tools.one_line_profile: Improved large scale object detection in aerial/satellite imagery
tools.detailed_description: The fourth version of the YOLT framework, incorporating improvements from YOLOv4 for faster and more accurate object detection in geospatial imagery.

tools.name: Raster Vision
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for satellite and aerial imagery
tools.detailed_description: An open-source framework that bridges the gap between deep learning and GIS, enabling users to train models and run inference on large geospatial datasets.

tools.name: Raster Vision QGIS Plugin
tools.one_line_profile: QGIS plugin for Raster Vision
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for QGIS that integrates Raster Vision functionality, allowing users to run deep learning workflows directly within the GIS environment.

tools.name: teamlucc
tools.one_line_profile: R package for land use and cover change analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to facilitate the analysis of land use and land cover change (LULCC) using satellite imagery.

tools.name: AiTLAS Arena
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark framework for Earth Observation image classification
tools.detailed_description: An open-source benchmark framework for evaluating and comparing deep learning approaches for image classification tasks in Earth Observation.

tools.name: LiDAR-CURB-DETECTION
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithm for road curb detection using 3D LiDAR data
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation of a simple algorithm to detect curbs in road environments using 3D LiDAR point clouds, useful for autonomous driving and road mapping applications.

tools.name: Non-uniform-quadtree-map
tools.one_line_profile: Non-Uniform Quadtree Map Building Method
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation for building non-uniform quadtree maps, including dead-end semantics extraction, useful for robotic mapping and navigation tasks.

tools.name: fast-surface-nets-rs
tools.one_line_profile: Fast isosurface extraction algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A Rust implementation of the Surface Nets algorithm for fast isosurface extraction from volumetric data, applicable in scientific visualization and mesh generation.

tools.name: YOLOX-OBB
tools.one_line_profile: Oriented Object Detection based on YOLOX
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of YOLOX adapted for Oriented Object Detection (OBB) using KLD loss, specifically tested on the DOTA dataset for aerial imagery.

tools.name: HRSID
tools.one_line_profile: High Resolution SAR Images Dataset for Ship Detection
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset for ship detection, semantic segmentation, and instance segmentation in high-resolution SAR images.

tools.name: VHR-10_dataset_coco
tools.one_line_profile: NWPU VHR-10 Dataset converted to COCO format
tools.detailed_description: Object detection and instance segmentation dataset for VHR remote sensing images, providing the NWPU VHR-10 dataset in standard COCO format.

tools.name: YOLOv5-ODConvNeXt
tools.one_line_profile: Improved YOLOv5 for ship detection on drone images
tools.detailed_description: An enhanced version of YOLOv5 integrating ODConvNeXt modules, optimized for ship detection tasks in drone-captured imagery.

tools.name: 3D_Ground_Segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Ground segmentation algorithm for 3D point clouds
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation of a ground segmentation algorithm for 3D LiDAR point clouds, capable of distinguishing road and non-road points and extracting road surfaces.

tools.name: split_raster
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to split large raster images into tiles
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to easily break down large raster images into smaller tiles, facilitating deep learning and computer vision tasks on geospatial data.

tools.name: Unet-of-remote-sensing-image
tools.one_line_profile: U-Net implementation for remote sensing semantic segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning project implementing U-Net for semantic segmentation tasks specifically on remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: ISPRS_S2FL
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal Remote Sensing Benchmark Datasets
tools.detailed_description: Benchmark datasets for land cover classification using multimodal remote sensing data, associated with ISPRS JP&RS 2021 paper.

tools.name: RSE_Cross-city
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-City Semantic Segmentation Benchmark Dataset
tools.detailed_description: A multimodal remote sensing benchmark dataset for cross-city semantic segmentation using high-resolution domain adaptation networks.

tools.name: toulouse-road-network-dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for Toulouse Road Network Dataset
tools.detailed_description: Python code to generate the Toulouse Road Network dataset used for image-conditioned graph generation for road network extraction.

tools.name: Aerial-YOLO-DOTA
tools.one_line_profile: YOLOv9 implementation for aerial object detection
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit implementing YOLOv9 for object detection in aerial and satellite imagery using the DOTA v1.5 dataset, including custom data pipelines and evaluation tools.

tools.name: BuildSeg
tools.one_line_profile: QGIS plugin for building extraction from remote sensing imagery based on ONNX
tools.detailed_description: A QGIS plugin designed to extract building footprints from remote sensing imagery using deep learning models (ONNX format). It integrates segmentation capabilities directly into the GIS workflow.

tools.name: SSDGL
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral-Spatial-Dependent Global Learning Framework for Hyperspectral Image Classification
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework implementing a spectral-spatial-dependent global learning method for hyperspectral image classification, specifically addressing issues of insufficient and imbalanced data.

tools.name: geobits
tools.one_line_profile: ArUco Ground Control Point detection for aerial imagery photogrammetry
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting ArUco markers used as Ground Control Points (GCPs) in aerial imagery, facilitating the processing and georeferencing of UAV/MAV data.

tools.name: SegEarth-OV-2
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation-Free Open-Vocabulary Segmentation for Remote Sensing Images
tools.detailed_description: A segmentation tool designed for remote sensing imagery that utilizes open-vocabulary models to perform segmentation without requiring specific annotations, enabling flexible extraction of geospatial features.

tools.name: SegEarth-OV-3
tools.one_line_profile: Open-Vocabulary Semantic Segmentation in Remote Sensing Images using SAM 3
tools.detailed_description: An advanced iteration of the SegEarth tool exploring the use of the Segment Anything Model 3 (SAM 3) for open-vocabulary semantic segmentation tasks in remote sensing.

tools.name: samroadplus
tools.one_line_profile: Satellite Image Road Graph Extraction Method
tools.detailed_description: A method and tool for extracting road graphs from satellite imagery on a global scale, presented at CVPR 2025. It focuses on converting raster imagery into vectorized road networks.

tools.name: Hyperspectral-Classification
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch framework for Hyperspectral Image Classification
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library providing implementations of various deep learning models for the classification of hyperspectral imaging (HSI) data.

tools.name: CNN-SoilTextureClassification
tools.one_line_profile: 1D-CNN for soil texture classification from hyperspectral data
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing 1-dimensional convolutional neural networks to classify soil textures based on hyperspectral measurement data, aiding in soil science and geological analysis.

tools.name: Polar-Encodings-SAR-Ship-Detection
tools.one_line_profile: Arbitrary-Oriented Ship Detection in SAR Images using Polar Encodings
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a method for detecting ships in Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) images, specifically handling arbitrary orientations using polar encodings.

tools.name: Mask_RCNN-Ship-Detection
tools.one_line_profile: Mask R-CNN implementation adapted for ship detection in satellite imagery
tools.detailed_description: A fork of the Matterport Mask R-CNN library configured and demonstrated for the specific task of detecting ships in satellite imagery, serving as a baseline tool for this application.

tools.name: land-cover-classification-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for Land-Cover and Land-Use Classification from Satellite Images
tools.detailed_description: A processing pipeline designed to classify land-cover and land-use from satellite imagery, facilitating ecological and geographical analysis.

tools.name: HybridSN
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid-Spectral-Net for Hyperspectral Image Classification
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the HybridSN architecture (3D-2D CNN) for the classification of hyperspectral images, providing a tool for high-accuracy spectral data analysis.

tools.name: SMPISD-MTPNet
tools.one_line_profile: Scene Semantic Prior-Assisted Infrared Ship Detection
tools.detailed_description: A multi-task perception network designed for detecting ships in infrared imagery by leveraging scene semantic priors, useful for maritime monitoring in specific spectral bands.

tools.name: deeplearn_hsi
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning-Based Classification of Hyperspectral Data
tools.detailed_description: Source code and tools for deep learning-based classification of hyperspectral data, supporting research in spectral image analysis.

tools.name: sam_road
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale vectorized road network extraction using SAM
tools.detailed_description: A tool leveraging the Segment Anything Model (SAM) for extracting large-scale, vectorized road networks from aerial imagery, facilitating automated mapping.

tools.name: yolov5_obb
tools.one_line_profile: Oriented Object Detection (OBB) based on YOLOv5
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of YOLOv5 modified for Oriented Object Detection (OBB), which is critical for detecting rotated objects like ships and vehicles in aerial and satellite imagery.

tools.name: Geoseg
tools.one_line_profile: Computer vision package for automatic building segmentation and outline extraction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive computer vision toolkit designed for geospatial applications, specifically focusing on automatic building segmentation and outline extraction from remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: torchrs
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of popular datasets and models in remote sensing
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library that provides implementations of popular datasets and deep learning models specifically tailored for remote sensing tasks, facilitating research and development in geospatial computer vision.

tools.name: yoro
tools.one_line_profile: YOLO variant for rotated object detection
tools.detailed_description: A specialized implementation of the YOLO architecture adapted for rotated object detection, commonly used in aerial and satellite imagery analysis where objects are not axis-aligned.

tools.name: Ship-Detection-SAR
tools.one_line_profile: Maritime vessel detection from SAR data using Faster-RCNN and YOLOv5
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning solver for detecting maritime vessels in Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) data, implementing and adapting Faster-RCNN and YOLOv5 architectures for remote sensing applications.

tools.name: road_building_extraction
tools.one_line_profile: U-Net implementation for road and building extraction from satellite imagery
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the U-Net architecture specifically tuned for the semantic segmentation and extraction of road networks and building footprints from satellite imagery.

tools.name: road_extraction_remote_sensing
tools.one_line_profile: Road extraction based on U-Net architecture for DeepGlobe Challenge
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning solution for road extraction from remote sensing images, originally developed for the CVPR2018 DeepGlobe Challenge, utilizing U-Net architecture.

tools.name: ppllama
tools.one_line_profile: PaddlePaddle implementation of LLaMA language model
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the LLaMA large language model using the PaddlePaddle deep learning framework, enabling researchers using PaddlePaddle to leverage large language models.

tools.name: DeHIC
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for hyperspectral image classification
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework designed specifically for the classification of hyperspectral images, providing tools and models to process high-dimensional spectral data.

tools.name: UAV-to-UAV-Detection-Tracking
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithm for UAV detection and tracking from another flying UAV
tools.detailed_description: A computer vision and deep learning-based system for detecting and tracking Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs) using imagery captured from another UAV, addressing air-to-air visual tracking challenges.

tools.name: DSVT-AI-TRT
tools.one_line_profile: TensorRT implementation of Dynamic Sparse Voxel Transformer for 3D detection
tools.detailed_description: An optimized implementation of the Dynamic Sparse Voxel Transformer (DSVT) using TensorRT for efficient 3D object detection in point cloud data, achieving high performance on Waymo datasets.

tools.name: HiRoNEx
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic unsupervised extraction of historical road networks from maps
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for the automatic and fully unsupervised extraction of historical road networks from scanned historical maps, facilitating historical geography and spatial analysis.

tools.name: TrafficMonitoring
tools.one_line_profile: Trajectory extraction of road users via traffic camera
tools.detailed_description: A computer vision tool for extracting trajectories of road users (vehicles, pedestrians) from traffic camera footage, useful for transportation research and traffic analysis.

tools.name: SuperPCA
tools.one_line_profile: Dimensionality reduction and classification of hyperspectral images
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the SuperPCA algorithm for dimensionality reduction and classification of hyperspectral images, addressing the high dimensionality challenge in spectral data analysis.

tools.name: BIT_CD
tools.one_line_profile: Remote sensing image change detection with transformers
tools.detailed_description: The official PyTorch implementation of the Bitemporal Image Transformer (BIT) for efficient and accurate change detection in remote sensing images.

tools.name: IAug_CDNet
tools.one_line_profile: Adversarial instance augmentation for building change detection
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Adversarial Instance Augmentation (IAug) specifically designed to improve building change detection performance in remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: SILI_CD
tools.one_line_profile: Continuous cross-resolution remote sensing image change detection
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning approach for change detection in remote sensing images with varying resolutions, addressing the challenge of cross-resolution analysis.

tools.name: deck.gl-raster
tools.one_line_profile: WebGL modules for client-side satellite imagery analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A set of deck.gl layers and WebGL modules enabling high-performance client-side visualization and analysis of raster satellite imagery directly in the browser.

tools.name: Semantic-segmentation-RS
tools.one_line_profile: Semantic segmentation of remote sensing images using DeepLabv3
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of DeepLabv3 specifically adapted for the semantic segmentation of remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: SCAttNet
tools.one_line_profile: Semantic segmentation network with spatial and channel attention for high-resolution RS images
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning network incorporating spatial and channel attention mechanisms to improve semantic segmentation performance on high-resolution remote sensing images.

tools.name: CNN-LSTM_for_DSM
tools.one_line_profile: CNN-LSTM model for digital soil mapping using MODIS time series
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model combining CNN and LSTM to predict soil organic carbon content based on long time series of MODIS-based phenological variables, serving the field of Digital Soil Mapping (DSM).

tools.name: MambaHSI
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial-Spectral Mamba model for hyperspectral image classification
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model implementation utilizing the Mamba architecture for efficient and accurate spatial-spectral classification of hyperspectral remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: BAN
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model-based remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of a new learning paradigm for change detection in remote sensing images, leveraging foundation models for improved accuracy.

tools.name: Multimodal-Remote-Sensing-Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for multimodal remote sensing deep learning experiments
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit designed to facilitate deep learning experiments on multimodal remote sensing data, supporting data loading, processing, and model training.

tools.name: SegEarth-OV
tools.one_line_profile: Training-free open-vocabulary segmentation for remote sensing
tools.detailed_description: A framework for open-vocabulary segmentation in remote sensing images that operates without the need for specific training, enabling flexible object detection and segmentation.

tools.name: change_detection.pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning models library for remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive PyTorch library containing various deep learning models and utilities specifically for change detection tasks in remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: medSeg
tools.one_line_profile: Medical image segmentation toolkit based on PaddlePaddle
tools.detailed_description: A medical image segmentation framework built on PaddlePaddle, providing tools and models for processing and segmenting medical imaging data.

tools.name: Double-Branch-Dual-Attention-Mechanism-Network
tools.one_line_profile: Hyperspectral image classification network
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning network implementation featuring a double-branch dual-attention mechanism designed for high-accuracy hyperspectral image classification.

tools.name: MACU-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Semantic segmentation model for remote sensing images
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of MACU-Net, a deep learning model optimized for semantic segmentation tasks in remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: MAResU-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Semantic segmentation model for remote sensing images
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of MAResU-Net, a deep learning architecture for semantic segmentation of remote sensing data.

tools.name: Multi-Attention-Network
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-attention network for remote sensing segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning network utilizing multi-attention mechanisms for semantic segmentation of remote sensing images.

tools.name: DRBox
tools.one_line_profile: Rotated object detection algorithm for remote sensing
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based algorithm designed to detect rotated objects (e.g., vehicles, ships) in remote sensing images.

tools.name: Hyperspectral-classification-deeplearning
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for few-shot hyperspectral image classification
tools.detailed_description: A codebase implementing deep learning methods for hyperspectral image classification, specifically focusing on small sample size conditions.

tools.name: FCOSR
tools.one_line_profile: Anchor-free rotated detector for aerial object detection
tools.detailed_description: A simple anchor-free rotated object detector designed specifically for aerial imagery, enabling high-precision detection of oriented objects.

tools.name: BASS-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Band-adaptive network for hyperspectral image classification
tools.detailed_description: A deep neural network for hyperspectral image classification that learns band-adaptive spectral-spatial features.

tools.name: RoboSat
tools.one_line_profile: Semantic segmentation toolkit for aerial and satellite imagery
tools.detailed_description: An end-to-end pipeline for feature extraction from aerial and satellite imagery, including buildings, roads, and other land cover types, using semantic segmentation.

tools.name: satellite-image-object-detection
tools.one_line_profile: Object detection network for satellite images
tools.detailed_description: A YOLO-inspired deep neural network implementation specifically adapted for object detection tasks on satellite imagery.

tools.name: tree-detection-evo

tools.detailed_description: A tool for classifying tree species using 3D convolutional neural networks on airborne hyperspectral and LiDAR data.

tools.name: 3D-HyperGAMO

tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Generative Adversarial Minority Oversampling (GAMO) for improving spectral-spatial hyperspectral image classification, particularly for imbalanced datasets.

tools.name: hyperspectral_deeplearning_review
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for hyperspectral image classifiers
tools.detailed_description: Code repository accompanying a review paper, providing implementations and benchmarks for various deep learning classifiers used in hyperspectral imaging.

tools.name: pResNet-HSI
tools.one_line_profile: Pyramidal Residual Networks for hyperspectral classification
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Deep Pyramidal Residual Networks specifically designed for spectral-spatial classification of hyperspectral images.

tools.name: DeepSatData
tools.one_line_profile: Automated ML dataset creation from satellite images
tools.detailed_description: A tool to automatically generate machine learning-ready datasets from satellite imagery, facilitating the preparation of training data for remote sensing models.

tools.name: High-Resolution-Remote-Sensing-Semantic-Segmentation-PyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of semantic segmentation models for high-resolution remote sensing imagery
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive collection of deep learning models specifically implemented for semantic segmentation tasks on high-resolution remote sensing data, serving as a solver for land cover classification.

tools.name: open-solution-ship-detection
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning solution for ship detection in satellite imagery
tools.detailed_description: An open-source implementation for ship detection in satellite imagery, originally developed for the Airbus Ship Detection Challenge, providing a reusable solver for maritime object detection.

tools.name: Rotated-RetinaNet
tools.one_line_profile: Rotated RetinaNet implementation for arbitrary-oriented object detection
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of RetinaNet adapted for detecting objects with arbitrary orientations, which is critical for aerial and satellite imagery analysis where objects are not axis-aligned.

tools.name: CoANet
tools.one_line_profile: Connectivity Attention Network for road extraction from satellite imagery
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model (CoANet) designed to extract road networks from satellite imagery by leveraging connectivity attention mechanisms to improve segmentation continuity.

tools.name: drones-swarm
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation of UAV swarms for distributed target detection and tracking
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based simulation tool for adaptive exploration using UAV swarms, focusing on distributed target detection and tracking logic.

tools.name: PX4-ROS2-Gazebo-YOLOv8
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated simulation workflow for aerial object detection using PX4 and YOLOv8
tools.detailed_description: A simulation workflow integrating PX4 Autopilot, ROS 2, Gazebo, and YOLOv8 to perform and test aerial object detection tasks in a simulated drone environment.

tools.name: robust_matching_network_on_remote_sensing_imagery_pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Robust Matching Network for geometric transformation estimation on remote sensing imagery
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of a robust matching network designed to estimate geometric transformations between remote sensing images, useful for image registration.

tools.name: rshf
tools.one_line_profile: Utility library for loading remote sensing pretrained models via Hugging Face
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that simplifies the process of loading and using pretrained remote sensing models from the Hugging Face Hub within PyTorch workflows.

tools.name: pytorch-caney
tools.one_line_profile: NASA-developed PyTorch package for geospatial deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library developed by NASA NCCS containing tools and utilities for geospatial deep learning applications, including segmentation and classification of satellite data.

tools.name: py_cfar
tools.one_line_profile: Vessel detection in SAR images using CFAR algorithms
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Constant False Alarm Rate (CFAR) algorithms for detecting vessels in Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) imagery.

tools.name: DeepSim
tools.one_line_profile: GPS spoofing detection on UAVs using satellite imagery matching
tools.detailed_description: Source code for DeepSIM, a system that detects GPS spoofing attacks on UAVs by matching live camera feed with satellite imagery.

tools.name: DeepHyperX
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning toolbox for hyperspectral data classification
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based toolbox designed for the classification of hyperspectral remote sensing data, providing various deep learning models and utilities.

tools.name: mmrotate
tools.one_line_profile: OpenMMLab toolbox for rotated object detection
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolbox and benchmark for rotated object detection based on PyTorch, widely used for aerial and satellite imagery analysis.

tools.name: geoai
tools.one_line_profile: Artificial Intelligence toolkit for geospatial data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to facilitate the use of artificial intelligence and machine learning for geospatial data analysis, integrating with common geospatial workflows.

tools.name: GEE-LandCoverClass
tools.one_line_profile: Object-based land cover classification for Google Earth Engine
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts/tools for performing object-based land cover classification using Support Vector Machines within the Google Earth Engine platform.

tools.name: lsnms
tools.one_line_profile: Large Scale Non-Maximum Suppression for object detection on high-resolution imagery
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing a sparse, efficient Non-Maximum Suppression (NMS) algorithm (O(n log n)) specifically designed for object detection tasks on very large images, such as satellite or histology data.

tools.name: eo-learn
tools.one_line_profile: Earth observation processing framework for machine learning in Python
tools.detailed_description: A collection of open-source Python packages that bridge the gap between Earth Observation (EO) data and Machine Learning (ML) workflows. It allows users to easily access, process, and analyze satellite imagery.

tools.name: FDSSC
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Dense Spectral-Spatial Convolution Network for Hyperspectral Image Classification
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the FDSSC framework for hyperspectral image classification, designed to efficiently extract spectral and spatial features.

tools.name: UrbanCLIP-Dataset-Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for processing and integrating satellite imagery for urban analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit designed to facilitate the collection, processing, and integration of satellite imagery and associated metadata for urban analysis, associated with the UrbanCLIP project.

tools.name: MDL4OW
tools.one_line_profile: Multitask Deep Learning for Few-Shot Hyperspectral Image Classification
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a multitask deep learning method for few-shot hyperspectral image classification with unknown classes.

tools.name: Sat2Graph
tools.one_line_profile: Road Graph Extraction through Graph-Tensor Encoding
tools.detailed_description: A tool for extracting road graphs from satellite imagery using a graph-tensor encoding approach, enabling accurate road network reconstruction.

tools.name: TorchSat
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source deep learning framework for satellite imagery analysis
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework based on PyTorch specifically designed for satellite imagery analysis, providing models and utilities for common remote sensing tasks.

tools.name: SSRS
tools.one_line_profile: Semantic Segmentation for Remote Sensing
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive collection and framework for semantic segmentation models applied to remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: BuildingExtraction
tools.one_line_profile: Building extraction models (SDSC-UNet and DSAT-Net)
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of SDSC-UNet and DSAT-Net for extracting building footprints from remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: OpenLander
tools.one_line_profile: Landing-zone detection for UAV using DNNs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting safe landing zones for UAVs using deep neural networks for object segmentation.

tools.name: Crowdsourced-GPS-Road-Extraction
tools.one_line_profile: Road extraction from aerial imagery using crowdsourced GPS data
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a method to leverage crowdsourced GPS data for improving road extraction from aerial imagery.

tools.name: SDL-Skeleton
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for object skeleton detection and extraction
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for object skeleton detection, applicable to edge detection, building extraction, and road extraction in remote sensing images.

tools.name: A2S2K-ResNet
tools.one_line_profile: Attention-Based Adaptive Spectral-Spatial Kernel ResNet
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of A2S2K-ResNet for hyperspectral image classification, utilizing attention mechanisms and adaptive kernels.

tools.name: VecRoad
tools.one_line_profile: Point-based Iterative Graph Exploration for Road Graphs Extraction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of VecRoad, a method for extracting road graphs from imagery using point-based iterative graph exploration.

tools.name: SMOKE-Policy-Tool
tools.one_line_profile: Framework to model impact of Indonesian fires on public health
tools.detailed_description: A framework to model and project the impact of fires on public health based on land use/cover classification and fire emissions in Google Earth Engine.

tools.name: SGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Split Depth-wise Separable Graph Convolution Network for Road Extraction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of SGCN for road extraction in complex environments from high-resolution remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: ROS-road-line-junction-extraction
tools.one_line_profile: 3D road line extraction and junction detection for ROS
tools.detailed_description: A ROS package for 3D road line extraction, bird's-eye view projection, and junction detection from stereo images.

tools.name: CVNet
tools.one_line_profile: Contour Vibration Network for building extraction from remote sensing images
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of the CVPR 2022 paper 'CVNet: Contour Vibration Network for Building Extraction'. It provides a deep learning model specifically designed to extract building footprints with accurate contours from remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: R2CNN_HEAD_FPN_Tensorflow
tools.one_line_profile: Rotated Region CNN for arbitrary-oriented ship detection
tools.detailed_description: A Tensorflow implementation of Multiscale Rotation Region Convolutional Neural Network (R2CNN) for detecting ships with arbitrary orientations in remote sensing images. It includes position detection and direction prediction capabilities.

tools.name: GSNet
tools.one_line_profile: Open-vocabulary semantic segmentation for remote sensing images
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of the paper 'Towards Open-Vocabulary Remote Sensing Image Semantic Segmentation'. It provides a framework for segmenting remote sensing images using open-vocabulary prompts.

tools.name: CATNet
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-scale context aggregation for instance segmentation in remote sensing
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of CATNet (Context Aggregation Network) for instance segmentation in remote sensing images, as published in TNNLS 2024. It focuses on aggregating multi-scale context to improve segmentation accuracy.

tools.name: Pix2Poly
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end polygonal building footprint extraction
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of the WACV 2025 paper 'Pix2Poly'. It is a sequence prediction method designed to extract polygonal building footprints directly from remote sensing imagery in an end-to-end manner.

tools.name: OPLD
tools.one_line_profile: Point-guided localization for object detection in remote sensing
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of 'Learning Point-guided Localization for Detection in Remote Sensing Images'. It provides a method for improving object detection in aerial images using point guidance.

tools.name: RS-Nets
tools.one_line_profile: Resolution Switchable Networks for efficient image recognition
tools.detailed_description: Code release for the ECCV 2020 paper 'Resolution Switchable Networks for Runtime Efficient Image Recognition'. It offers a network architecture that can switch resolutions for efficient processing, applicable to remote sensing image recognition.

tools.name: GM-DETR
tools.one_line_profile: Generalized Multispectral Detection Transformer
tools.detailed_description: A Generalized Multispectral Detection Transformer (GM-DETR) with an efficient fusion encoder for visible-infrared object detection. It supports both PaddlePaddle and PyTorch frameworks.

tools.name: Boundary Loss for Remote Sensing
tools.one_line_profile: Boundary loss implementation for semantic segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch re-implementation of the boundary loss function proposed for remote sensing imagery semantic segmentation. This tool helps improve segmentation accuracy at object boundaries.

tools.name: SOLC
tools.one_line_profile: SAR-Optical Land-use Classification framework
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based framework for high-resolution remote sensing semantic segmentation and land-use classification, specifically designed for fusing SAR and Optical data.

tools.name: RoadExtraction
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithms for road extraction from remote sensing images
tools.detailed_description: A collection of implementations for road extraction algorithms from remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: NLLinkNet
tools.one_line_profile: Non-Local LinkNet for road extraction
tools.detailed_description: Official code for the paper 'NL-LinkNet: Toward Lighter but More Accurate Road Extraction with Non-Local Operations'. It implements a deep learning model optimized for extracting road networks from satellite imagery.

tools.name: FCNs-for-road-extraction-keras
tools.one_line_profile: Keras implementation of FCNs for road extraction
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit implementing various Fully Convolutional Networks (FCNs) and semantic segmentation networks for road extraction from high-resolution remote sensing images using Keras.

tools.name: HSI_SSFTT
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral-Spatial Feature Tokenization Transformer for HSI
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Spectral-Spatial Feature Tokenization Transformer (SSFTT) for Hyperspectral Image (HSI) classification, as published in IEEE TGRS 2022.

tools.name: SAFF
tools.one_line_profile: Self-Attention-Based Deep Feature Fusion for scene classification
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of SAFF (Self-Attention-Based Deep Feature Fusion) for Remote Sensing Scene Classification.

tools.name: HSI_Classification
tools.one_line_profile: Hyperspectral imagery classification toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing code and methods for the classification of hyperspectral imagery.

tools.name: iFLYTEK2021-Cultivated-Land-Extraction
tools.one_line_profile: Cultivated land extraction solution
tools.detailed_description: The winning solution (1st place) for the iFLYTEK 2021 Cultivated Land Extraction from High-Resolution Remote Sensing Image Challenge. It serves as a robust baseline and tool for agricultural land segmentation.

tools.name: RotaYolo
tools.one_line_profile: Oriented object detection with Ring-Shaped Rotated Convolution
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of RotaYolo, featuring Linear Gaussian Bounding Box Representation and Ring-Shaped Rotated Convolution for Oriented Object Detection, published in Pattern Recognition 2024.

tools.name: DCIC22-SAR-ship-detection
tools.one_line_profile: SAR ship detection solution
tools.detailed_description: The 2nd place solution for the DCIC 2022 Intelligent Detection of Maritime Ships challenge. It provides a pipeline for detecting ships in SAR (Synthetic Aperture Radar) imagery.

tools.name: PSGAN
tools.one_line_profile: Generative Adversarial Network for Pan-sharpening
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of PSGAN (Pan-sharpening GAN) for remote sensing image pan-sharpening, as published in IEEE TGRS 2021. It fuses high-resolution panchromatic images with low-resolution multispectral images.

tools.name: SSRN
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral-Spatial Residual Network for HSI classification
tools.detailed_description: TensorFlow/Keras implementation of Spectral-Spatial Residual Network (SSRN) for Hyperspectral Image Classification, a 3D deep learning framework published in IEEE TGRS.

tools.name: SSTN
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral-Spatial Transformer Network for HSI classification
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of Spectral-Spatial Transformer Networks (SSTN) for hyperspectral image classification, providing a Factorized Architecture Search (FAS) framework.

tools.name: D-LinkNet
tools.one_line_profile: Road extraction network with dilated convolution
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of D-LinkNet, a LinkNet architecture with pretrained encoder and dilated convolution, designed for high-resolution satellite imagery road extraction. It was a winning solution in the DeepGlobe Road Extraction Challenge.

tools.name: PolyWorld
tools.one_line_profile: Polygonal building extraction with Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of PolyWorld, a method for extracting buildings as polygons from satellite images using Graph Neural Networks. It directly predicts building vertices and their connections.

tools.name: EDNet
tools.one_line_profile: Edge-Optimized Small Target Detection in UAV Imagery
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of EDNet, a deep learning model optimized for detecting small targets in UAV (Unmanned Aerial Vehicle) imagery, with a focus on edge information.

tools.name: Road-Extraction-Algorithms
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of road extraction algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A repository implementing various algorithms for road extraction from remote sensing images.

tools.name: SAR Ship Detection
tools.one_line_profile: Fast detection algorithm for SAR images
tools.detailed_description: A fast detection algorithm implementation for detecting ships in Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) images.

tools.name: Scale-Sets-Image-Analysis-Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for segmentation of remote sensing images
tools.detailed_description: A Scale-Sets Toolkit designed for the segmentation and analysis of remote sensing images, likely implementing object-based image analysis (OBIA) methods.

tools.name: Efficient-Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient Swin Transformer for remote sensing segmentation
tools.detailed_description: An efficient transformer model improved based on Swin Transformer, specifically applied to and optimized for remote sensing image segmentation tasks.
